trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Black Rock
There were no other sightings in Black Rock on or around November 18th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsWas looking for reported enid-falling stars, and noticed a bright light moving from the southwest heading northeast. As it moved overhead I noticed it was as bright as the north star and was moving in a straight line. It was traveling as fast as a jet plane and I noticed that there were no blinking "strobes" as you would expect to see on Jetliners. So as it passed by I expected to hear the noise of the jet engines, there was none. It was very quiet outside with no wind blowing. This being strange to me I picked up my binoculars and focused on the object as it was moving away and all I could see was the light itself, I didn't see any wings or outside structures just a bright light, Even with the binoculars still didn't see any strobes blinking to clarify that it was a plane. I watched it for a few minutes as it moved out of the area, never heard any sound. I didn't see any other air traffic at the time I sighted the object. I have seen aircraft flying through all the time and could easily identify jetliners and small planes because of the blinking lights, and this was very unusual to me because I couldn't identify what it was with the binoculars, and the fact there was no sound.
Summary: Starlike with no sound throughout sighting.
